item.title: Trump calls on Republicans to 'stop grandstanding' on budget
item.description: President Trump urged Republicans to support and pass the budget resolution this week, telling them to "stop grandstanding."

item.title: Trump says tariffs on medicine coming
item.description: President Trump announced that pharmaceuticals will be the next target of his tariffs, which he says will bring pharmaceutical production back to the ...

item.title: House panel to consider legislation that would halt taxpayer money flowing to the Taliban
item.description: The House Foreign Affairs Committee is set to consider legislation that would halt millions in U.S. tax dollars from flowing to the Taliban.

item.title: Pentagon offering back pay, benefits to troops forced out over refusal to follow COVID mandates
item.description: The Pentagon is reaching out to some 8,700 ex-service members who were forced out of the military over the Defense Department's COVID-19 mandate durin...

item.title: Trump orders coal back into U.S. energy portfolio
item.description: President Trump, surrounded by miners in hard hats, signed several executive orders Tuesday to reinvigorate the coal industry.
